channel.title: Ancients Command
channel.description:
can anyone give me a code for my client.java to change normal magics to ancient magics and vice versa? I would have no idea where to start.
thanks

item.title: Ancients Command
item.dc:creator: @b1g_th13f b1g th13f
item.description:
@b1g_th13f wrote:

if (command.startsWith("switch")){ NpcDialogue = 0; NpcDialogueSend = false; animation(435, absY, absX); RemoveAllWindows(); if (ancients == 1) { setSidebarInterface(6, 1151); //magic tab (ancient = 12855); ancients = 0; sendMessage("You convert to normal magic."); } else { setSidebarInterface(6, 12855); //magic tab (ancient = 12855); ancients = 1; sendMessage("You convert to ancients."); } }

Read full topic
